metadata.name: Fox Soul Festival
metadata.description:
A girl wearing a fox mask.
This girl's face is not shown because she is not a specific character.
She may be the girl you met that summer, the girl you will meet in the future, or yourself.

I mainly used watercolor to blur the boundaries and depict her in a mysterious way in order to express 
the memories of summer with her and the glamorous and secretive atmosphere.
Particular attention was paid to her vivid yukata and fluttering hair.

Fireworks
Tamaya" and "Kagiya" are the trade names of fireworks craftsmen in Edo.
The word "fox fire" led people to believe that Inari-sama was beneficial for fire prevention.

While carefully depicting the fireworks that color the summer night sky, 
the background of the fireworks and the night sky behind them are also blurred. 
We hope you can sense the painstaking work that went into the seemingly simple black background.
